name: Foldable query using KNN on image_vector

body.query:
FROM employees
| WHERE KNN(image_vector, [0.4, 0.5, 0.9], 1 + 1)
| KEEP hire_date, salary, salary_change, salary_change_long, name, image_vector
| SORT name
| LIMIT 2
